description: This notification is sent when the value of
pcePcepSessState enters the sessionUp state.
The current state of the session.
The set of possible states excludes the idle state since
entries do not exist in this table in the idle state.
variables.name: PCE-PCEP-MIB::pcePcepSessState

description: The value of sysUpTime at the time this session entered its
current state as denoted by the pcePcepSessState object.
variables.name: PCE-PCEP-MIB::pcePcepSessStateLastChange

description: This notification is sent when the value of
pcePcepSessState leaves the sessionUp state.
The current state of the session.
The set of possible states excludes the idle state since
entries do not exist in this table in the idle state.
variables.name: PCE-PCEP-MIB::pcePcepSessState

description: The value of sysUpTime at the time this session entered its
current state as denoted by the pcePcepSessState object.
variables.name: PCE-PCEP-MIB::pcePcepSessStateLastChange

description: This notification is sent when a peer enters overload
state.
If the peer has informed the local PCEP entity that it is
currently overloaded, then this is set to true. Otherwise
it is set to false.
variables.name: PCE-PCEP-MIB::pcePcepSessPeerOverloaded

description: The interval of time that is remaining until the peer will
cease to be overloaded. If it is not known how long the
peer will stay in overloaded state, this field is set to
zero.
This field is only used if pcePcepSessPeerOverloaded is set
to true. Otherwise, it is not used and MUST be set to
zero.
variables.name: PCE-PCEP-MIB::pcePcepSessPeerOverloadTime

description: This notification is sent when a peer leaves overload
state.

event.Summary: PCEP peer recovered from overload state

description: If the peer has informed the local PCEP entity that it is
currently overloaded, then this is set to true. Otherwise
it is set to false.
variables.name: PCE-PCEP-MIB::pcePcepSessPeerOverloaded
